question.text: You are waiting to come out of a side road. Why should you watch carefully for motorcycles?

explanation.text: If you’re waiting to emerge from a side road watch out for motorcycles: they’re small and can be difficult to see. Be especially careful if there are parked vehicles restricting your view, there might be a motorcycle approaching. IF YOU DON’T KNOW, DON’T GO.

answer.text: Motorcycles are usually faster than cars
Motorcycles are small and hard to see
